resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108093</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108093</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206570</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Observing Constitution Day</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beobachten Des Beschaffenheit-Tages</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Observer Le Jour de Constitution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Observando O Dia Do Constitution</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Osservazione Del Giorno Di Costituzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρατήρηση της ημέρας συνταγμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Observación De Día De la Constitución</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">features a discussion about the Constitutional Convention and the Constitution. Lists of delegates, issues involved in the creation and ratification of the document, and its implementation are included.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kennzeichnet eine Diskussion über die 
konstitutionelle Versammlung und die Beschaffenheit. Listen der 
Delegierter, die Ausgaben, die in die Kreation und in die Bestätigung
des Dokumentes mit einbezogen werden, und seine Implementierung sind 
enthalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">comporte une discussion au sujet de la convention 
constitutionnelle et de la constitution. Les listes de 
délégués, les issues impliquées dans la création et la 
ratification du document, et sa mise en place sont incluses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">caracteriza uma discussão sobre a convenção 
constitutional e o constitution. As listas dos delegados, as 
edições envolvidas na criação e no ratification do original, e sua
execução são incluídas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">caratterizza una discussione circa la convenzione 
costituzionale e la costituzione. Le liste dei delegati, le 
edizioni addette alla creazione ed alla ratifica del documento e la 
relativa implementazione sono incluse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χαρακτηρίζει μια συζήτηση για τη συνταγματική Συνθήκη 
και το σύνταγμα. Οι κατάλογοι εκπροσώπων, ζητήματα που 
περιλαμβάνονται στη δημιουργία και την επικύρωση του εγγράφου, και
της εφαρμογής του συμπεριλαμβάνονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ofrece una discusión sobre la convención 
constitucional y la constitución. Las listas de delegados, las 
ediciones implicadas en la creación y la ratificación del documento,
y su puesta en práctica son incluidas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206570</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108093</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/observing-constitution-day</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
